summary:
The Quran is the most important book in Islam, believed to be God's words revealed to the prophet Muhammad. It is made up of 114 chapters called surahs, filled with verses (ayahs). Muslims think it's the best Arabic literature and a miracle from God.

It was revealed to Muhammad over 23 years and compiled after his death. The Quran guides Muslims on how to live and is recited during prayers, only in Arabic. Special recitation rules, called tajwid, are followed. Many Muslims memorize the whole Quran, becoming hafizes.
title: Quran
